page.title: 09LIFE IN THE ROBOROUGH AREA
page.content: I like living in this area because it is peaceful. I like it because we have lots of woods and moorland. I like it because we have open fields to play in. I like it because I can walk out of my garden into a park and then down to a stream. Then up the hill there is a farm with geese,roosters,chicks and a donkey. We often go down to the woods to make tree dens and find flowers. I like our school because we have got lots of big trees round it and it is very pretty.We also have a big field to play in. I like living here because we have a good play park near us. I think I would rather live here than anywhere else.This area is so nice I would not want to move away.
